channel.title: Data management on DNA confesses Data speak

item.title: Backup automatically with cron
item.description: Data backup is an essential step in the data analysis life cycle. As shown in a pic below taken from DataOne. There are so many important things you may want to back up: your raw/processed data, your code, and your dot configuration files. While for every project, I have git version control my scripts (not the data) and push it to github or gitlab to have a backup, big files can not be hosted on github or gitlab.
